docs.snippet: LEAD: Wilson Ferreira Aldunate, the leader of Uruguay's largest opposition party, died today after a yearlong fight against cancer, his family said. He was 69 years old.

docs.snippet: LEAD:  Park Lodges  Question:We are planning to visit the Grand Canyon, Bryce Canyon and Zion National Parks in May and want to stay in the parks. What accommodations are available? - B. Y. K., White Plains  Answer:At the Grand Canyon's North Rim,...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Park Lodges Question:We are planning to visit the Grand Canyon, Bryce Canyon and Zion National Parks in May and want to stay in the parks. What accommodations are available? - B. Y. K., White Plains Answer:At the Grand Canyon's North Rim, which some visitors say has a more spectacular view than the South Rim, the sole hotel is the Grand Canyon Lodge.

docs.snippet: LEAD: A group of Falklands fishing companies plans to open the first ferry service between the South Atlantic archipelago and the South American mainland since the war between Britain and Argentina in 1982. A spokesman for the consortium, which has...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A group of Falklands fishing companies plans to open the first ferry service between the South Atlantic archipelago and the South American mainland since the war between Britain and Argentina in 1982. A spokesman for the consortium, which has raised $1.8 million to buy a suitable vessel, said today that it would operate a passenger and cargo service between the Falklands and Montevideo, Uruguay, and Punta Arenas, Chile.

docs.snippet: LEAD: A clash between the White House and Congress that could spike 1988 trade legislation endangers major international economic intitiatives of the United States, including a free trade pact with Canada, and could weaken the nation's global...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A clash between the White House and Congress that could spike 1988 trade legislation endangers major international economic intitiatives of the United States, including a free trade pact with Canada, and could weaken the nation's global posture, analysts warn.

headline.main: Wide Effect Seen in U.S. Trade Fight

docs.snippet: LEAD: The Senate passed trade legislation today that would overhaul the way the nation defends itself against unfair foreign trading practices. But the 63-to-36 vote fell three short of the two-thirds majority needed to override a threatened veto.
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The Senate passed trade legislation today that would overhaul the way the nation defends itself against unfair foreign trading practices. But the 63-to-36 vote fell three short of the two-thirds majority needed to override a threatened veto.

headline.main: TRADE BILL VOTED IN SENATE BY 63-36 BUT IS FACING VETO
